title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: November 28, 2022, 02:04:00 AMLast edit: November 29, 2022, 02:52:20 PM by minerjones
content: A sealed box of 25x 1k silver finish metal chips made my Moonbits in 2018.Quote from: Kryptowerk on November 28, 2022, 10:47:27 AMFunding can be found here: https://btc.cryptoid.info/btc/tx.dws?3bee55bc819e209fe3a466810eaf57c850378762bd69f94bca0894080040c456.htm  (#2875 -> 378)More info: https://github.com/LIMXTEC/MoonBits/tree/master/BitcoinThis box is from the first batch of Bitcoin-loaded Moonbits ever produced.Inside is a 3d-printed plastic case containing the 25 chips. See moonbits reference: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114574.0STARTING BID: 0.0250BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0005BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 2nd, 2022, 15:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on November 28, 2022, 10:47:27 AM✂This box is from the first batch of Bitcoin-loaded Moonbits ever produced.Inside is a 3d-printed plastic case containing the 25 chips. See moonbits reference: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114574.0nice auction mji own a Moonbits 1k bits box but only in brass finish and i have a 5k box in silver finish as well good luck to all biders

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on November 29, 2022, 02:39:24 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on November 28, 2022, 10:47:27 AM✂This box is from the first batch of Bitcoin-loaded Moonbits ever produced.Inside is a 3d-printed plastic case containing the 25 chips. See moonbits reference: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114574.0✂i own a Moonbits 1k bits box but only in brass finish and i have a 5k box in silver finish as well ✂Jfyi, there was never a silver finish 5k chip, all of them were titan finish.Since there were only 500 5k chips (lowest Moonbits BTC run) and many of them sold as solo chips, this box is still probably one of the rarest things in regards of Moonbits you can own. Cograts.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on November 29, 2022, 04:40:37 PMQuote from: cygan on November 29, 2022, 02:39:24 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on November 28, 2022, 10:47:27 AM✂This box is from the first batch of Bitcoin-loaded Moonbits ever produced.Inside is a 3d-printed plastic case containing the 25 chips. See moonbits reference: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5114574.0✂i own a Moonbits 1k bits box but only in brass finish and i have a 5k box in silver finish as well ✂Jfyi, there was never a silver finish 5k chip, all of them were titan finish.Since there were only 500 5k chips (lowest Moonbits BTC run) and many of them sold as solo chips, this box is still probably one of the rarest things in regards of Moonbits you can own. Cograts. sorry, you are right it was my mistake - just check my collection and its the titan finish box (serials: #R0601-R0625)
